description: ERB template syntax in shell script causing RPM build failure: Unprocessed Ruby interpolation (`<%= %>`) in delete-reports.erb leads to shell syntax errors. Subsequent failures in RPM dependency resolution (shell.req) due to invalid script content.

CMake configuration failure: Outdated cmake_minimum_required version in CMakeLists.txt (compatibility with CMake <3.5 removed). Requires updating minimum CMake version specification to support modern build system.
Missing distribution metadata: PyGLM-2.7.3.dist-info directory not found in buildroot, indicating incomplete Python package installation or incorrect packaging configuration.
Test suite failure in PostgreSQL cluster parsing: ValueError during test_db_parsing due to invalid IPv6 URL handling in database configuration validation.
Documentation build failure: Invalid None value in intersphinx_mapping configuration for Sphinx, requiring tuple-based format for Python documentation references.
Documentation build DNS failure: Temporary name resolution error while fetching intersphinx inventory from docs.python.org, preventing proper API reference linking.
